1.0.name: wordpress/wp-e-commerce-product-search-widget
1.0.description:
A full fledged wp e-commerce product search widget with grid view. NO GOLD CART REQUIRED. This search widget was orginally developed for our site http://www.salespagehost.com. to give a grid view product search results page without the gold cart plugin.

Languages Supported:

  • English
  • German
  • French
